sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { MyContext } from './05_useContext' export default function HookUseContextChild (props) { const { name } = props /** * useContext * 应用场景：如果页面组件层级深并且需要子组件触发state的变化 */ const contextValue = useContext(MyContext) return

{contextValue}

{name}

}
